events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred at the intersection causing front bumper damage.
The claim related to the reported accident was categorized under Auto Accident for further processing.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the vehicle damage claim and communicate with the customer.
Customer was notified that their auto accident claim has been received and acknowledged successfully.
The insurance team requested photos of the vehicle damage along with a police report and repair estimate.
The customer submitted all requested documentation including damage photos, police report, and repair shop estimate.
The claims investigation team began reviewing all submitted evidence and contacting involved parties.
The investigation into the car accident and surrounding circumstances has been completed successfully.
A settlement offer was proposed covering the full estimated repair costs and vehicle damage compensation.
The customer responded positively to the settlement offer and thanked the agent for their prompt service.
The insurance claim was officially approved following customer agreement to the proposed settlement.
The payment covering the vehicle repair costs was issued directly to the authorized repair shop.
The auto accident claim has been closed after final payment and customer confirmation of repair completion.
All claim files and related documents have been archived for compliance and future reference.
